PLUME: Phlox, it has been some time since we have settled on this island in the hurricane's eye.
2 1 PLUME: How are you enjoying your stay, my dear son? I worry this stormy planet may not be a safe environment for one as young as you..
3 2 PHLOX: No, no, papa! I am enjoying it plenty.. As long as I can be with you, I am happy!
4 3 PHLOX: The only thing is... I miss counting stars with you, papa.
5 4 PHLOX: If only <color=lightblue>Giant's Deep</color> didn't have such thick clouds, we could be able to stargaze here like we did every night back home.
6 5 PLUME: Ah, I.. I see... How you warm this old heart, dear Phlox.
7 6 PLUME: When we next return to <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow,</color> I promise we shall spend the night counting as many stars as you desire.
